h1_title: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
h2_title: How to Find Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
h3_title: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind at Yoaguai Chiefs you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The pair of heads will attack using fire, and are the last bosses you'll fight as part of the Woods of Ember pathway.
## How to Find Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
You can find this duo immediately after fighting the Gray-Bronze Cart.
### Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind Boss Fight and Guide

While you're doing this, Fast as Wind will follow you blowing gusts of wind down on you. If this hits you, it will also burn you. Avoid this while you focus on putting an end to Quick as Fire.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic moment from the "Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind" boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It shows the player character facing off against one of the bosses, likely "Fast as Wind," characterized by its massive mane of flowing hair and imposing presence. The dark, rocky environment with eerie carved faces in the background sets a foreboding tone, emphasizing the intensity of the battle. This visual aligns with the guide's description of the duo's elemental attacks and the player's need to avoid wind gusts while focusing on defeating "Quick as Fire."
